import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartIcon from "../../components/icon/CartIcon"; import { NavigationContainer, NavigationResonsive, NavigationMenu, NavigationLogo, NavigationMobile, } from "../ui/navigation-menu"; function Header() { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); // State to toggle the hamburger menu const toggleDarkMode = () => { setIsDarkMode((prev) => !prev); document.documentElement.classList.toggle("dark"); }; const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen((prev) => !prev); // Toggle the mobile menu visibility }; return ( ShopHub {/* Add other menu items for larger screens */}

{/* Hamburger Icon for Mobile */} ); } export default Header;
